'''1.21.4 Release Candidate 1''' (known as '''1.21.4-rc1''' in the [[launcher]]) is the first [[release candidate]] for [[Java Edition 1.21.4]], released on November 28, 2024,<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-4-release-candidate-1|Minecraft 1.21.4 Release Candidate 1|November 28, 2024}}</ref> which fixes bugs.

== Additions ==
=== General ===
'''[[Language]]s'''
* Added support for [[w:Popoloca language|Popoloca]] language.

== Fixes ==
{{Fixes|fixedin=1.21.4 Release Candidate 1
|;dev
|278494|Resin Bricks appears twice in "{{cd|mineable/pickaxe}}" block tag.
|;prev
|278548|Spyglass is held incorrectly when used from the off hand.
